text: Tapa'i bhannus ki akasaharu ra prthvima jeâ€“jati cha kasako ho? Bhanidinus ki yo sabai allahakai lagi hun. Allahale krpa garna aphno jim'ma anivarya garihaleko cha. Usale timi sabaila'i kiyamatako dina jam'ma garnecha yasa kurama pani kunai sanka chaina jasale aphula'i noksanima parisakeka chan tinaile imana lya'umdainan
